thread.title: Laura Hodgson

author: Laura Hodgson
title: Laura Hodgson
text:
Richard- Job 302410
Richard was polite, helpful and friendly. The wheel was fitted extremely quickly and efficiently. Excellent service. 8 have used Tyres on the drive a few times and the fitters are always well mannered and friendly and get the job done quickly. I use tyres on the drive every time now and recommended them to anyone who needs tyres fitting.
